Use natural cleaning methods: You can use natural cleaning methods like using vinegar and baking soda to clean your home. Baking soda is a great deodorizer and can be used to clean the bathroom and kitchen. Vinegar is a great disinfectant and can be used to clean the floors and windows.

Use essential oils: Essential oils like tea tree oil and lavender oil have antimicrobial properties and can be used to clean surfaces and kill germs. You can add a few drops of these oils to a spray bottle and use it to clean your home.
Use a steam cleaner: A steam cleaner can be used to clean surfaces without the use of any cleaning products. You can use a steam cleaner to clean your floors, windows, and even your clothes.

Use a water filter: If all soap and cleaning products disappeared, you would need to find a way to filter your water. You can use a water filter to remove any impurities from your water and make it safe to drink.
Use a UV light: A UV light can be used to kill germs and bacteria. You can use a UV light to clean your home and kill any germs that may be present on surfaces.
